propositions.text: Longing can be exhausting when it becomes overwhelming
Life is a simple concept yet difficult to understand or master
Life as a journey of experiences, landscapes, and insights
Life does not demand greatness, only sincere engagement
Desire to uncover the true essence of life and personal purpose
Feelings are real yet intangible, profound yet inexpressible

concepts.name: Longing
concepts.context: Repeated theme of missing someone or something, often tied to emotional fatigue

concepts.name: Life
concepts.context: Central idea explored as a journey and a concept to be understood

concepts.name: Journey
concepts.context: Metaphor for life, involving experiences and insights

concepts.name: Essence
concepts.context: Search for true meaning or purpose in life

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured around repetitive reflections on longing and life, with subsections focusing on emotional states and philosophical musings.
